a - Variable in class cz.zcu.fav.kiv.jsim.random.JSimUniformStream

actionRunUntilTimeLimit() - Method in class cz.zcu.fav.kiv.jsim.gui.JSimMainWindow
Runs an unspecified number of simulation steps until the simulation time is equal to or greater than the time specified in the `Time Limit' input field.
